operations.notes:
Creates a new setting inside Smart Canvas. You should NOT store confidential information inside the settings area.

This operation requires the scopes: 'smartcanvas.admin.write'.

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: Client ID required to make this API call

parameters.name: x-access-token
parameters.description: Access token

parameters.name: x-suppress-response-codes
parameters.description: If 'true', the HTTP response is always 200. Default = 'false'

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Setting name that will be used as a key to store its value. Should not contain spaces or special characters.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value for this setting.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category for this setting. That's an useful way to group settings altogether.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description for this setting.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Locale for this setting in format [language]-[country]. That's an optional value. If null, this setting will be valid for all locales.

responseMessages.message: See Response Codes for all response and error codes
